笚字的基本解释

笚
dā
竹相击。

笚
xiá
古同“筪”，竹名。

笚
nà
古同“笝”，系船的竹索。

笚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dā］
［《廣韻》都盍切，入盍，端。］
竹互相击打。
[②]［xiá］
［《廣韻》胡甲切，入狎，匣。］
同“筪1”。
竹名。
[③]［nà］
［《集韻》諾盍切，入盍，泥。］
同“笝1”。
系船用的竹缆。

笚字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　笚； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页879第31
【廣韻】胡甲切【集韻】轄甲切，?音狎。竹名，同筪。　又【廣韻】都搕切【集韻】德盍切，?音䓠。竹相擊也。　又【集韻】諾盍切，音魶。維舟竹索。同笝。

笚字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
笚字的起名意思

暂无。

笚
Basic explanation of words
笚
dā
Bamboo strikes.
笚
xiá
In ancient times, the same name is "筪", bamboo name.
笚
nà
In ancient times, "Sai", the bamboo rope of the boat.
笚
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dā］
["Guangyun" all cuts, enters, and ends. ]
Bamboos beat each other.
[②]［xiá］
["Guangyun" Hu Jia cuts, enters 狎, box. ]
Same as "筪1".
Bamboo name.
[③] [nà]
["Jiyun" Nuoqi cuts, enters, mud. ]
Same as "笝1".
Bamboo cables for mooring ships.
笚
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set on] [Bamboo Character Department] 　笚; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 879 31
[Guang Yun] Hu Jiaqie [Jiyun] Jurisdiction over Jiaqie,? Yinxie. The bamboo name is the same as Yun.　[Guang Yun] All Diqie [Ji Yun] De Qiqie,? Yin Qi. Bamboo strikes also.　[Jiyun] Nuoqie, sound. Weizhou bamboo cable. The same.
